name: EDITO PH1 Holo-Mero Plankton Dataset (SCHPM1)
description: Plankton lifeform dataset generated from EDITO data source for PH1 application. Includes holo- and mero-plankton lifeforms extracted and processed from the EDITO data lake.

name: EDITO PH1 Holo-Mero Plankton Dataset (SNS)
description: Plankton lifeform dataset generated from EDITO data source for PH1 application. Includes holo- and mero-plankton lifeforms extracted and processed from the EDITO data lake.
